transcripts.text: you.  I am a Promethean.  My work isn't about the behavior of non-white peoples.  It isn't about mass relocations.  It isn't about superiority or inferiority, dominance or stereotypes.  It isn't about looking backward.  It isn't about violence.  No race is the enemy.  No genetics makes a person virtuous.  My work is about white well-being.  And no matter what race you are, the race of your wife or husband or children, your sexual orientation or your checkered past, if you serve white well-being, you are welcome here.
